          May 21 - June 20
          Fireball pumpkin pie
        • Cancer
          June 21 - July 22
          Bucket of ice water
        • Leo
          July 23 - August 22
          S'mores
        • Virgo
          August 23 - September 22
          Vodka mocha bundt cake
        • Libra
          September 23 - October 22
